name: Bloblin
description:
Destroy boxes that have the same colour. The bigger the combo, the more points you get. The objective of the game is to survive by exploding columns of boxes faster than they spawn. Once the boxes reach the end of the platform, you lose the game. On the other hand, if you manage to destroy boxes you climb up the levels. 

Level difficulty increases at levels: 6, 11, 16, and 21.

Nightmode levels: 5, 10, 15, and 20.

Enjoy! :D
